description_for_human: Access your cross-project knowledge, insights, learning goals, and notes through Alex's cognitive architecture.
description_for_model: This plugin provides access to the user's personal knowledge base managed by Alex Cognitive Architecture. Use searchKnowledge to find patterns and learnings from past projects. Use getInsights to retrieve recent insights and discoveries. Use getProfile to understand user preferences and learning goals. Use getNotes to access reminders and observations. Use getLearningGoals to see what the user wants to learn and track their progress. Use addReminder to create reminders. Use addNote to save notes and observations.

functions.name: searchKnowledge
functions.description: Search the user's global knowledge base for patterns, insights, and learnings from past projects. Returns relevant domain knowledge files (DK-*) and global patterns (GK-*).

functions.name: getInsights
functions.description: Retrieve recent insights and discoveries captured across projects. These are timestamped learnings (GI-*) that Alex has helped the user consolidate.

functions.name: getProfile
functions.description: Get the user's profile including name, communication preferences, expertise areas, and current projects. Use this to personalize responses.

functions.name: getNotes
functions.description: Access the user's notes, reminders, and Alex's observations. Can filter by type (reminder, note, observation) and status (active, completed).

functions.name: getLearningGoals
functions.description: Get the user's learning goals and track progress on skills they're developing. Returns active goals, related patterns, and recent topics practiced.

functions.name: addReminder
functions.description: Create a new reminder for the user. Reminders can be triggered by date/time, keywords mentioned in conversation, or project context. Use this when user says 'remind me to...' or 'don't let me forget...'

functions.name: addNote
functions.description: Save a persistent note or observation to the user's memory. Use 'note' type when user says 'remember that...' and 'observation' type for Alex's own insights about patterns.

functions.name: updateReminder
functions.description: Update a reminder's status - mark as completed, snooze, reactivate, or delete. Use when user says 'done with reminder' or 'forget the reminder about...'
